revisionDesc.change: Finalized - This is good to go.
Finalized - This is good to go.

Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - Ok. Avoid beginning sentences with capitals; fix dots in fr. 1.i.2-3; dot tau in fr. 1.i.4; at end of fr. 1.i.6 it should be .1φ̣.2 instead of .4; add hyphen to fr. 1.i.16 (and 22-23, 28) and dot all of ἀπὸ; in fr. 1.i.17 first hypsilon is dotted (not in square brackets); watch brackets in fr. 1.ii.4; watch extra space in fr. 1.ii.8; watch dots in fr. 1.ii.11; watch hyphen in fr. 1.ii.18; watch dot in fr. 1.ii.19; regularize in fr. 1.ii.23; I would encode fr. 1.ii.28 with the initial nu as a correction; watch brackets in fr. 1.ii.30; add dots in fr. 1.ii.35; add dots in fr. 2.i.2; use square brackets at beginning of fr. 2.i.3; add accents in fr. 2.i.7 and 17; watch brackets in fr. 2.i.23; fix dot in fr. 2.i.24; lost.1lin in fr. 2.i.25; add filler(diple) to fr. 2.i.28; iota adscript in fr. 2.i.19; remove extra space in fr. 2.i.31; add fr. 2.i.33 as [.?].1; encode .14 at end of fr. 2.ii.3; dot first two alphas of ἀ[ν]αλ in fr. 2.ii.17; capitalize in fr. 2.ii.20; dot first sigma of fr. 2.ii.32; no square brackets at start of fr. 2.ii.34; fix the accent on fr. 3.i.15; delete fr. 3.i.19 (bottom of column); no final sigma in fr. 4.4; dot first iota in fr. 5.6. Review all metadata before finalization.

Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - Ok. Avoid beginning sentences with capitals; fix dots in fr. 1.i.2-3; dot tau in fr. 1.i.4; at end of fr. 1.i.6 it should be .1φ̣.2 instead of .4; add hyphen to fr. 1.i.16 (and 22-23, 28) and dot all of ἀπὸ; in fr. 1.i.17 first hypsilon is dotted (not in square brackets); watch brackets in fr. 1.ii.4; watch extra space in fr. 1.ii.8; watch dots in fr. 1.ii.11; watch hyphen in fr. 1.ii.18; watch dot in fr. 1.ii.19; regularize in fr. 1.ii.23; I would encode fr. 1.ii.28 with the initial nu as a correction; watch brackets in fr. 1.ii.30; add dots in fr. 1.ii.35; add dots in fr. 2.i.2; use square brackets at beginning of fr. 2.i.3; add accents in fr. 2.i.7 and 17; watch brackets in fr. 2.i.23; fix dot in fr. 2.i.24; lost.1lin in fr. 2.i.25; add filler(diple) to fr. 2.i.28; iota adscript in fr. 2.i.19; remove extra space in fr. 2.i.31; add fr. 2.i.33 as [.?].1; encode .14 at end of fr. 2.ii.3; dot first two alphas of ἀ[ν]αλ in fr. 2.ii.17; capitalize in fr. 2.ii.20; dot first sigma of fr. 2.ii.32; no square brackets at start of fr. 2.ii.34; fix the accent on fr. 3.i.15; delete fr. 3.i.19 (bottom of column); no final sigma in fr. 4.4; dot first iota in fr. 5.6. Review all metadata before finalization.
